HiSpeed Networks was revolutionizing the economics of global information exchanged. Our purpose-built, high-performance IP platforms enable customers to support many different services and applications at scale.

Service providers, enterprisese, governments, and research and education institutions worldwide rely on the company to deliver products for building networks that are tailored to the individual needs of their users, services, and applications.
